ygData.subject: Pottery
ygData.msgSnippet: WARNING TEST SERVER has changed the Pottery costs, and is NOT profitable at all, details below. With a CHA 85 now
ygData.messageBody:
WARNING TEST SERVER has changed the Pottery costs, and is NOT profitable at all, details below.

With a CHA 85

now before

Sketch 1pp 6sp 1cp --------- 1sp 1cp
water 1sp 1cp --------------- 1sp 1cp
Clay 4sp 3cp ----------------- 4sp 3cp
Sheet 4sp 3cp ---------------- 4sp 3cp

As you can see this is not going to go over to well, this increase is WAY to much, considering the
sales of a pie tin after fired is only 6 gp 5 sp 7 cp. Get your pottery and money now, regular
servers are going to be updated this Tuesday...
